ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent post operative hemorrhaging.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to the finding category or diagnosis code. The intent of this data element is to identify patients with post operative hemorrhaging.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with post operative hemorrhaging.),(Exclusion Criteria: Concepts that do not indicate a post operative hemorrhage.)
